fko.chessly.openingbook

Class OpeningBookImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • fko.chessly.openingbook.OpeningBookImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OpeningBook, java.io.Serializable

    public class OpeningBookImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements OpeningBook, java.io.Serializable
    Implements an Opening Book for Chessly. Reads different formats and caches result in serialized bin files. Implemented are PGN, SAN, SIMPLE and SER.
    Author:
    Frank Kopp
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
